What are the treatments for dyserythropoietic anemia and thrombocytopenia ?,These resources address the diagnosis or management of dyserythropoietic anemia and thrombocytopenia:  - Gene Review: Gene Review: GATA1-Related X-Linked Cytopenia  - Genetic Testing Registry: GATA-1-related thrombocytopenia with dyserythropoiesis   These resources from MedlinePlus offer information about the diagnosis and man
